KENTARO
PIGOT健太郎

アートに国境はない en art, point de frontière

I AM A SELF-TAUGHT FRENCH/JAPANESE WEB DEVELOPER. FORMER GAME DESIGNER WHO STUDIED AT DIGIPEN SINGAPORE, I VENTURED INTO WEB DEVELOPMENT LESS THAN A YEAR AGO OUT OF CURIOSITY. I DEEPLY FELL IN LOVE WITH IT AND ITS INCREDIBLE CREATIVE POTENTIAL.

FOR THESE REASONS, I STARTED THE FRENCH "OPENCLASSROOMS" BOOTCAMP, AND MADE THE DECISION TO EXPAND MY TOOLKIT BY LEARNING THREEJS, THUS PUSHING THE BOUNDARIES OF MY CREATIVE CAPABILITIES.

私の他のスキル

I primarily use React as my main framework, but I'm also very comfortable working with pure vanilla JavaScript.

I am familiar with Node.js, including data modelling, error handling and advanced features (email, file uploads, payments...)

I also use Blender for 3D models, Illustrator for SVGs, Ableton for sound effects, Photoshop for images, and various other tools.

私のさまざまなスキル mes compétences

ART AS A
TOOL.

My goal is to give the best possible experience by providing a work that fit the requisites that I receive.

私の目標は、 私が受け取った要件を満たす仕事。
